description: At Forward, I developed and maintained a platform of components and tools to support U.S. public sector leaders, improving efficiency and compliance. I enhanced communication services for government programs through SMS, calls, video conferencing, and email, while designing API improvements that cut response times by 50%. Improved database queries through stored procedures and ORM optimization, and designed efficient data flows to support the front-end application's data needs.
